entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 in the evening then falling. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening with risk of freezing rain. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
